nameBasedDTO.name: Aasimar
nameBasedDTO.description: Aasimar are mortals with celestial heritage. They have traits hinting at their divine ancestry, like glowing eyes or metallic freckles.

nameBasedDTO.name: Light Bearer
nameBasedDTO.description: You know the Light cantrip, allowing you to emit light to brighten your surroundings.

features.description: This feature allows the aasimar to use the Light cantrip at will.
